1_1jUh3EtfZLmmqigyGvfPcDPEKPBW1awBE.body: Unless you own or have full control over both nodes of the VPN connection it cannot be "trusted" in the way I think you mean, as the other node has full knowledge of your connections through that tunnel. You should use Tor instead which is designed to prevent this by using this setup: You<->Entry<->Relay<->Exit<->(Clear-net or Hidden-Service), where each node only has knowledge of each "neighbor".
